statements: SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress > 80;
SELECT course_name, progress FROM student_progress WHERE grade >= 3.5;
SELECT student_id, course_name, grade FROM student_progress WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM student_progress ORDER BY grade DESC, progress ASC;
SELECT course_id, AVG(grade) AS avg_grade FROM student_progress GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress > 80 ORDER BY progress DESC
SELECT student_id, course_name, grade FROM student_progress WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT course_id, course_name, progress FROM student_progress WHERE progress < 50 ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE grade BETWEEN 70 AND 80 ORDER BY course_name, progress DESC
SELECT course_id, course_name, grade FROM student_progress WHERE course_name LIKE '%Physics%' ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'Professor Smith';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE credits = 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 'e3b065bc-4ce3-44ff-ae6c-0a7a315f9576';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 80;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade, date_of_grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = grades.course_id WHERE students.student_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY date_of_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i10j11k12l'
SELECT student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 'a1b2c3d4-5e6f-7g8h-9i10j11k12l'
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade >= 80

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade, date_of_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE date_of_grade BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date_of_grade DESC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_credits > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id;

SELECT student_name, assignment_name, assignment_score FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Grades ON Enrollments.enrollment_id = Grades.enrollment_id WHERE assignment_score >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enroll_date, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_credits FROM Courses WHERE course_credits > 3 ORDER BY course_credits DESC;

SELECT student_name, assignment_name, assignment_score FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Grades ON Enrollments.enrollment_id = Grades.enrollment_id WHERE assignment_score >= 90;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, final_grade FROM students s INNER JOIN transcripts t ON s.student_id = t.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY student_name, course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_name, final_grade FROM students JOIN transcripts ON students.student_id = transcripts.student_id JOIN courses ON transcripts.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3 ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade, grade_date FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id ORDER BY grade ASC;
